/Strings for Ashmolean page/ Ashmolean Museum Address: Beaumont Street, Oxford OX1 2PH. Hours Tue – Sun 10:00 – 17:00 Website: http://www.ashmolean.org The Ashmolean Museum of Art and Archaeology on Beaumont Street, Oxford, England, is the worlds first university museum. Its first building was erected in 1678–83 to house the cabinet of curiosities that 'Elias Ashmole' gave to the University of Oxford in 1677. Sign up to tour Review this place
